actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide a user fee for customs services provided at certain small airports.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to charge a user fee to individuals for the use of customs services at the Lebanon, New Hampshire, airport and other designated airports. Provides a formula for the designation of such airports. Sets forth penalties for the failure to pay such user fee.

titles.title: A bill to provide a user fee for customs services provided at certain small airports.
